description: Complete scanner integration with 7 major improvements: AST integration for 95% accuracy, parallel processing for 3-5x performance, LRU caching, relationship tracking, dynamic imports support, and progress reporting
goal: Transform scanner from regex-only to hybrid AST+regex system with parallel processing, achieving 95% accuracy and 3-5x performance improvement
requirements: Hybrid AST + regex integration for 95% accuracy (up from 85%)
Parallel file processing with worker threads for 3-5x performance
LRU caching system with memory cap for repeated scans
Dynamic import support with ESM detection
Real-time progress reporting with streaming results
Update communication.json after each task completion
out_of_scope: CLI tool changes (focus on core library only)
Breaking API changes to existing scanner interface
UI dashboard integration (scanner UI already exists)
constraints: Maintain backward compatibility with existing scanCurrentElements API
No breaking changes to ElementData interface
Must work with existing preset system
Performance improvements must be measurable and documented
